problem: A factory uses machines X, Y, and Z to produce two types of gadgets, A and B. Machine X can produce 5 gadgets of type A and 3 gadgets of type B per hour. Machine Y can produce 4 gadgets of type A and 7 gadgets of type B per hour. Machine Z can produce 2 gadgets of type A and 4 gadgets of type B per hour. If the factory has a total of 6 hours for all machines to operate and needs to produce 19 gadgets of type A and 29 gadgets of type B, how many hours should machine X operate?
